original: Bergenstråhle, Gösta Christian Fredrik, överste, Skövde, f. 10/9/91 i Ystad av ryttm. Fredrik G. G. B. o. Maria Berling. G. 23 m. Greta Löf-gren. Barn: Göran f. 24, Fredrik 26, Carl-Gustaf 29, Johan 41. — KS 12-13, RS 14-15, KHS 24-26, Chasseur à cbeval’, Orleans, 30-31, École isuperi-eure de Guerre à Paris 31-33. Major v. Norrl. dragoner 37-40, v. Livreg. t. häst 40-41, överstelöjtn. v. Livreg. t. häst 41-45, sekundchef f. Livreg. husarer fr. 46. GVrsJmt, RSO, RB-LeopO, RFinlVROlkl, RFrHL, Sthlms Skytteförb. GM, Västerb. Skytteförb. SM, SkytteM.
translated: Bergenstråhle, Gösta Christian Fredrik, Colonel, Skövde, b. 10/9/91 in Ystad to Cavalry officer Fredrik G. G. B. and Maria Berling. Married in 1923 to Greta Löfgren. Children: Göran b. 1924, Fredrik b. 1926, Carl-Gustaf b. 1929, Johan b. 1941. Served in Cavalry School 1912-1913, Military Academy Cavalry Course 1914-1915, Cavalry Chasseurs in Orleans 1930-1931, Higher War School in Paris 1931-1933. Major in Norrland Dragoons 1937-1940, then transferred to the Life Regiment of Horse until 1941 when he was promoted to Lieutenant Colonel and became Deputy Commander of the Life Regiment of Horse. In 1946 he became the Second-in-Command of the Life Regiment Hussars. Recipient of GVrsJmt, RSO, RB-LeopO, RFinlVROlkl, RFrHL, Sthlms Skytteförb. GM, Västerb. Skytteförb. SM, SkytteM.
